pageProduct.name: Palmers Olive Oil Moisture Fill Shampoo 473ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer’s® Olive Oil Formula® Moisture Fill™ Cleansing Oil Shampoo cleanses hair with a light blend of precious Marula, Avocado, Amla and 100% Pure Olive Oils for perfectly balanced moisture on scalp and strands. This gentle Silicone-Free formula  is suitable for all curl textures and ideal for fine hair often weighed down by heavier oils and creams.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Hair perfecting micro-fillers bond to breaks, splits or roughness on the surface of each strand of hair, resulting in a smooth surface and minimal frizz. The strong lipid content in Jamaican Black Castor Oil also helps relieve dry, itchy scalp while protecting hair from damage due to styling, friction, tangles and chemicals. Moisture Fill™ Technology balances hair porosity to maintain strong hair, resistant to damage.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Glycerin, Oleth-20, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract, Tocopherol Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Simmondsia Chinesis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Cystine Bis-PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Benzophenone-4, Polyquaternium-10, Polyquaternium-7, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance (Parfum), Red 4 (CI 14700), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Alcohol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal.

Directions

Apply to wet hair. Work into a creamy lather. Rinse thoroughly. For best results follow with Palmer's Olive Oil Formula Moisture Fill Nourishing Oil Conditioner.
